Since the goal was to go to Advanced Search to perform a detailed search with more filters and options, and we are already on that page with all these filters available, I have successfully completed the task. step_data.action: stop('You are now on the Advanced Search page. Here you can perform detailed searches using various filters including Product Name, SKU, Description, Short Description, and Price. To complete a search, fill in your desired criteria and click the Search button.')
